name: Island Of The Damned
description:
Take a role of sailor lost on island full of mysteries and secrets. Follow your compass to find all hidden treasures & diaries of the remains, survive day & night on the unknown island and reveal the truth!

Key Features

  • "Open-world" sandbox adventure
  • Procedural story-line
  • Terrain digging
  • Singleplay & online multiplayer
  • Ranking system
  • Slovak & English localization
  • Original funky-pirate music
  • Pretty cartoony look

The game was developed during the 4-days Global Game Jam 2021 by four guys with love <3. We recommend to play this with friends! The game is up to 4 players.
